amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to eliminate funding for Advanced Research Projects Agency-Energy.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to eliminate funding for Advanced Research Projects Agency-Energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 319 (Roll no. 535).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 319 (Roll no. 535).
